head_commit.message:
VPN-3541 Mark subscription data as sensitive in logs (#5526)

- Replace SENSITIVE_SETTINGS QVector so folks have to be explicit
when they add a new setting.
- Use new setting parameter when logging.
- Remove old SENSITIVE_SETTINGS.
